* Bit depth: 16 bit						  *
* Sample rate: 44.1 kHz						  *
* Ripping software: Unknown	                                  *
* Transcoding: ffmpeg | FLAC 1.3.0 --best -V	                  *
*                                                                 *
* Includes notes in English, German, and French		          *
*								  *
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

This box set was originally created by sheila6. Her(?) rip was a good one,
but it had several problems. Though uploaded to the FLAC category, it used
the annoying Monkey's Audio format; filenaming and metadata were also
inconsistent. I have taken the liberty of transcoding her rip to FLAC
and cleaning up the files and metadata. No music was harmed in this process.
These are lossless copies of the original CD audio, to the best of my knowledge.

For security, it is *highly* recommended that you verify this album with 
PGP immediately after downloading it. If you don't know what PGP is or how 
to use it, download GnuPG and learn. A brief run-through is included with 
the torrent, but you'd better do some external reading. In short, download
the torrent, copy the PGP sig from freetexthost, import my public key 
(0x37921081), and verify the archive containing the album. Only an authentic
copy of this rip will return a good signature--discard any torrent that fails.

*	*	*	*

PGP signature: freetexthost dot com slash 4gurgpm6bf

*	*	*	*

Post comments, send feedback, requests, criticism to chabosun at gmail dot
com (PGP encrypted, if possible).

* * * * * * * *
